clearStorage.description: Once you clear the storage, you will lose access to all you wallets. The only way to regain wallet access is by restoring wallet mnemonic phrase.

modal.title: Confirm Clear Storage
modal.description1: You may wish to verify your recovery mnemonic phrase before deletion to ensure that you can restore this wallet in the future.
modal.warning: Are you sure you want to clear the storage? If you have not backed up your wallet mnemonic phrase, you will result in losing your funds forever.
modal.disclaimer: I understand that the only way to regain access is by restoring wallet mnemonic phrase.
